snippet: Hosni Mubarak, Egypt’s former president, was abruptly moved from the comfort of a military hospital back to prison on Monday after a public prosecutor ruled that he was fit to serve his time behind bars.
abstract: Hosni Mubarak, Egypt’s former president, is abruptly moved from the comfort of a military hospital back to prison after a public prosecutor rules that he is fit to serve his time behind bars.
lead_paragraph: Hosni Mubarak, Egypt’s former president, was abruptly moved from the comfort of a military hospital back to prison on Monday after a public prosecutor ruled that he was fit to serve his time behind bars.

headline.seo: Mubarak Is Transferred Back to Prison
